sentences.en: He joined the 40th Division as an army chaplain.
sentences.cn: 他以随军牧师的身份加入第40师。

sentences.en: He was somebody in the law division.
sentences.cn: 他在法律部门是个人物。

sentences.en: Hibernian clinched the First Division title when they beat Hamilton 2-0.
sentences.cn: 希伯尼安队以2比0战胜汉密尔顿队，夺得了甲级联赛的冠军。

sentences.en: I taught my daughter how to do division at the age of six.
sentences.cn: 我女儿6岁时，我就教她怎样做除法。

sentences.en: Keegan's team have been cutting an irresistible swathe through the first division.
sentences.cn: 基冈的球队在甲级赛中所向披靡。

sentences.en: Relegation to the Third Division would prove catastrophic.
sentences.cn: 降到丙级将是灾难性的。

sentences.en: Rovers lost 4-1 and began their long exile from the First Division.
sentences.cn: 流浪者队以1比4落败，从此开始长期无缘甲级联赛。

sentences.en: The Army was plagued by internal divisions .
sentences.cn: 军队被内部分歧所困扰。

sentences.en: The club had slipped to the bottom of Division Four.
sentences.cn: 该俱乐部已经跌为丁级组的最后一名。

sentences.en: the Computer Services Division
sentences.cn: 电脑维修部

sentences.en: The current division of labor between workers and management will alter.
sentences.cn: 当前工人与管理部门的分工将会改变。

sentences.en: The current division of labour between workers and management will alter.
sentences.cn: 劳资双方目前的劳动分配将会改变。

sentences.en: the division between the haves and the have-nots
sentences.cn: 富人和穷人之间的差异

sentences.en: The division of Europe into warring blocs produces ever - increasing centrifugal stress.
sentences.cn: 把欧洲分为作战集团产生了越来越大的离心效果.

sentences.en: the division of labour between the sexes
sentences.cn: 男女分工

sentences.en: the division sign (÷)
sentences.cn: 除号

sentences.en: The essence of dialectical thought is division.
sentences.cn: 辩证思维的核心就是二分法。

sentences.en: The team has accustomed itself to the pace of first division rugby.
sentences.cn: 球队适应了英式橄榄球甲级联赛的节奏。

sentences.en: the traditional division of labour (= the way that particular tasks are shared ) between husband and wife
sentences.cn: 夫妻之间传统的分工

sentences.en: The two London clubs are the only undefeated teams in the division.
sentences.cn: 这两家伦敦的俱乐部是该级别里仅存的保持不败的球队。

sentences.en: Villa had just been relegated from the First Division.
sentences.cn: 维拉队刚刚从甲级联赛中降级。

words.tran_cn: 分裂的；分开的；有分歧的
分裂的；区分的；造成不和的
划分；除；分开；使产生分歧

phrases.tran_cn: 辗转相除法；除法算则，除法算式；带余除法
甲级（由联赛中较强的队组成）
频分复用；分频多路传输
时分；时间分割；时间划分
时分多路复用；时分多路转换

trans.tran_cn: 分开，分配，除法，分歧，部门，（军队）师，分组表决，（足球）级，分界线
trans.tran_en: the act of separating something into two or more different parts, or the way these parts are separated or shared
